snippet: President Obama halted the withdrawal of forces from Afghanistan, announcing that the U.S. would keep thousands of troops there through the end of his term in 2017.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

abstract: Pres Obama reverses decision to completely withdraw American military forces from Afghanistan, saying United States will keep 9,800 troops in country through most of 2016 before dropping total to about 5,500 in early 2017; move indefinitely continues US role in 14-year-old war and ensures that Obama will leave office without being able to follow through on seminal promise of his tenure.
